oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Yarbrough, Walter S.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: United States. Army; Infantry; 89th Division; 355th Regiment; Company F

Lieutenant Walter S. (�Wat�) Yarbrough, who was posthumously awarded the Distinguished Service Cross for extraordinary bravery, is buried in Rose Hill Cemetery in Columbia, Tennessee, beside his grandfather, Captain Thomas Gibson of Confederate fame.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Tennessee World War I Gold Star Records, 1918-1924 (RG 53)
